short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Family Guy wallpaper turn new tab to HD Family Guy background. Custom Family Guy wallpaper background themes for fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Each new tab displays a shuffled Family Guy wallpaper.
2. Customize your Family Guy background by randomizing or favoriting in the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Integrated Google search bar.
4. Direct links to email and social media platforms.
5. Automatically displays the current date and time.
6. New Note feature for jotting down tasks.
7. Quick links to frequently visited sites.
8. Simplified access to your bookmarks.
9. Shortcut panel for adding and accessing favorite websites quickly.
10. Direct links to Google apps.
11. Easy navigation to more themes.
12. One-click sharing to social media.
13. One-click download for wallpapers.
14. Instant access to games.
15. Activate entertaining animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks on your new Family Guy tab.
